thread.title: Temple Priest: Temple priest dies after ingesting goat blood | Coimbatore News - Times of India
thread.title_full: Temple Priest: Temple priest dies after ingesting goat blood | Coimbatore News - Times of India

author: TNN
title: Temple Priest: Temple priest dies after ingesting goat blood | Coimbatore News - Times of India
text: Erode: A special puja at a temple near Gobichettipalayam here turned tragic on Tuesday after a temple priest suddenly died during the ceremony. The deceased was identified as S Palanisamy, 45, of Kolappalur. Witnesses said when some goats were sacrificed as part of the ceremony, Palanisamy dipped bananas into the fresh blood and consumed it. While he was eating it, he collapsed suddenly. Villagers rushed him to the government hospital in Gobichettipalayam. However, doctors declared that he was brought dead. The body was then sent for a postmortem.
